title: Baoo
author: Baoo
content: Hi folks, I am Baoo from Upgrade Designs .We are looking for partners to cooperate with our company and help us in order to take a shortcut way to achieve our future goals.If anyone interested, please contact me via DM or TelegramSincerely,

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Baoo on June 20, 2022, 05:24:44 PMWe are looking for partners to cooperate with our company and help us in order to take a shortcut way to achieve our future goals.What will be the role for the partner? Will he be a part of the design team or you are looking for web developer, administrative support, marketing support or something else. A person could be an advisor too. You may need more clarification for the position you advertised. Telegram is a heaven of scammers. Please be careful.You have some interesting designs on the announcement topic. Good work.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: What are your future goals by the way? You should write some basic things before finding partners. Need to make sure what kind of partnership are you looking for. Without knowing your actual goals hard to find someone for partnership. There should be a win-win situation for both. So please mention your goal and project.

comments.author: Baoo
comments.body: Hey @BitcoinGirl.Club & @The Cryptovator , my apologies for the late reply.To begin with, I would like to clarify some points:We want to cooperate with solid projects or companies especially the ones with active communities, It should be a win-win from two sides.At this moment, we are not looking for partners to be a part of the team.Furthermore, our future goals are basically: - Increasing the total income of our company.- Creating Upgrade coin.- Building new projects related to NFT and Metaverse.- Building a crypto clothing store  and merchandise.- Doing charity works.

comments.author: cryptoperkele
comments.body: Quote from: Baoo on June 29, 2022, 12:09:08 AMFurthermore, our future goals are basically: - Increasing the total income of our company.- Creating Upgrade coin.- Building new projects related to NFT and Metaverse.- Building a crypto clothing store  and merchandise.- Doing charity works.So basically your partners are going to do everything? What's your role going to be? To lead?

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: Baoo on June 29, 2022, 12:09:08 AM~snipAt this moment, we are not looking for partners to be a part of the team.~snipIf you're not looking for actual partners, then why do you entitle this thread as looking for partners? Confusing, isn't it?So it means, you are just looking for a company for a partnership or that some called it a collaboration that will avail the services your offering and use your designs instead of continuing using their current one?
